solution_line_template: Nine times the price Bob paid for his acorns is {multiplier}*${bob_price} = ${<<{multiplier}*{bob_price}={alice_total_cost}>>}{alice_total_cost}
If Alice purchased {num_acorns_alice} acorns for nine times the price Bob paid, she paid ${alice_total_cost}/{num_acorns_alice} = ${cost_per_acorn} for each acorn.
